casebody.data:
The State, ex rel. Jones, Appellant, v. Ruggeri, Appellee.

[Cite as State, ex rel. Jones, v. Ruggeri (1990), 48 Ohio St. 3d 40.]

(No. 89-1084 Submitted November 7, 1989 Decided January 10, 1990.) Hillary James Jones and Vincent C. Rhodes, pro se.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed based on that court’s journal entry and opinion of May 19, 1989.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
